name: Automa-Tonne
description:
Automa-Tonne is a puzzle-platformer about a robot who must use its ability to switch its mass between light and heavy modes in order to solve puzzles and reach the exit of a mysterious laboratory.

(Yes, I know an automaton is not the same thing as a robot, but I had to make a pun somehow!)

This is my first full game, so feedback would be much appreciated!
Feel free to leave comments below.

Credits:
The background music is various ambient tracks from Mr. Robot Season 3 -  composed by Mac Quayle
The SFX came from various royalty free websites.
The robot sprite and animations come from Mounir Touhami on itch.io (https://mounirtohami.itch.io/26-animated-pixelart-robots)
The 2D laboratory tileset is by ExceptRea on itch.io (https://exceptrea.itch.io/2d-platformer-tileset-laboratory)
The keyboard key sprites and animations are from beamedeighth on itch.io (https://beamedeighth.itch.io/simplekeys-animated-pixel-keyboard-keys)
The rest of the pixel sprites were drawn by me.
